messages.content: Complete the following task as a native speaker of English. Familiarity is a measure of how familiar something is. An English word is very FAMILIAR if you see/hear it often and it is easily recognisable. In contrast, an English word is very UNFAMILIAR if you rarely see/hear it and it is relatively unrecognisable. Please indicate how familiar you think this English word is on a scale from 1 (VERY UNFAMILIAR) to 7 (VERY FAMILIAR), with the midpoint representing moderate familiarity. The English word is: "prosper". Only answer a number from 1 to 7. Please limit your answer to numbers.
